name: tempea
description: Node.js application for controlling room temperature via raspberry pi

scripts.wait_for_app:
echo "Waiting ${MAX_STARTUP_TIME}s for app at localhost:${EXPRESS_PORT}"; count=0; until curl -k -s localhost:${EXPRESS_PORT} > /dev/null; do if [ ${count} -ge ${MAX_STARTUP_TIME} ]; then printf '
Error: Unable to reach application'; exit 255; fi; printf '.'; sleep 1; count=$((count + 1)); done; printf '
Connection established'
scripts.test: npm run wait_for_app; npm run test_unit; npm run test_integration
scripts.coverage: EXPRESS_PORT=3001 ${NODE_PATH:-node_modules}/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text node app.js & NYC_PID=$!; EXPRESS_PORT=3001 ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nyc npm test > /dev/null; kill $NYC_PID; wait $NYC_PID; exit 0
scripts.ci: npm run lint; npm run test; npm run coverage
